sentences.en: Our products mainly include hearing aid, Lexis equips , blue tooth and related hearing equipments.

sentences.en: Semantic opacity in Japanese mainly results from the use of semantically vague, polysemic, and general lexis.
sentences.cn: 日语中主要使用语义模糊词语 、 多义词和语义概括(笼统)词语等来表达不明确的语义.

sentences.en: The lexicographer knew that the English lexis was changing.
sentences.cn: 字典编纂者知道英语词汇在不断变化。
